message.content:
cs.LO, cs.PL, cs.SE, cs.FL, cs.SC. 

The paper presents a verification technique for program safety, which is a topic in software engineering (cs.SE) and formal methods (cs.LO). The technique combines Iterated Specialization and Interpolating Horn Clause Solving, which are both related to logic programming (cs.PL) and constraint solving (cs.SC). The paper also mentions the use of widening operators, which are commonly used in abstract interpretation (cs.FL).
